title: dance-trance synth sounds - EXS 24 mk2 preset
description:
Samplerbanks.com - dance-trance synth sounds - EXS 24 mk2 preset collection

Great sample package, a set of multi-sampled and categorized instrument of the famous Clavia Nord Modular G2  synthesizer, collected into a collection of EXS 24 mk II presets, using all the great features of this sample.

Shaking basses, dark pads and swirling arpeggios, cutting-edge leads are all there to add a distinctive character, to make your mind blowing and your production shine.

Realtime control possibilites are also added: just move the modulation wheel to change several parameters in real-time in order to make sound ?breathe?.

SamplerBanks.com_EXS24_mkII_bank.zip - 230 MB
